long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you ever was too lazy to install phonetic library, change keyboard layout or just don't have permissions to do so. Here comes LATOCY. It converts Latin to Cyrillic. You can write whatever you want on Latin => select this text => press CTRL+Q and you will have translated text in your clipboard. That Easy!! Or you can write straight in extension => click convert. Ready. Ochen' prosto => CTRL+Q => Очень просто
